author: SegmentLinking
body:
The Alpaka Acc concept started to be enforced in #49848. This didn't cause any issues in the LST compilation within CMSSW, but inadvertently broke the standalone compilation since an Alpaka function was being called outside a kernel. After some discussion, it turned out that this piece was not needed, since that variable is not used. So I'm removing those lines to fix the compilation issue.

Backport of #49796 to 16.0.x.

c.c. @slava77
title: Remove unnecessary code that is causing issues with Acc concept [16.0.x]
